snippet: The appointment of Mr. Patel, currently a deputy governor of the Reserve Bank of India, ends weeks of speculation about a successor to Raghuram Rajan....
abstract: Urjit R Patel is appointed by Indian government as new governor of Reserve Bank of India; Patel will succeed Raghuram G Rajan, who is unexpectedly stepping down in September.
lead_paragraph: The appointment of Mr. Patel, currently a deputy governor of the Reserve Bank of India, ends weeks of speculation about a successor to Raghuram Rajan.

headline.main: India Names Urjit Patel to Be Next Central Bank Chief
headline.print_headline: India Names Next Central Bank Governor
